content.raw: We actually don't need the pull request, since macs have libcurl by default (`/usr/lib/libcurl.dylib`); they just lack the `libcurl.pc` file. Normally this just works on homebrew, but there's currently a bug while they're moving things around. We can use this hack for now, but we should be able to remove it after upstream homebrew fixes things.
